verses.name: Genesis 15:10
verses.text: And he took unto him all these, and divided them in the midst, and laid each piece one against another: but the birds divided he not.

verses.name: Genesis 15:11
verses.text: And when the fowls came down upon the carcases, Abram drove them away.

verses.name: Genesis 15:12
verses.text: And when the sun was going down, a deep sleep fell upon Abram; and, lo, an horror of great darkness fell upon him.

verses.name: Genesis 15:13
verses.text: And he said unto Abram, Know of a surety that thy seed shall be a stranger in a land that is not theirs, and shall serve them; and they shall afflict them four hundred years;
